sqlMap.select: SELECT YEAR , DEPT_CD , DEPT_KOR_NM FROM ( SELECT YEAR, DEPT_CD, DEPT_KOR_NM FROM BSC_INSA_DEPT WHERE YEAR = #findYear# ORDER BY DISP_ORDER, DEPT_CD ) WHERE DEPT_CD = '0000'

SELECT YEAR , DEPT_CD , DEPT_KOR_NM , UP_DEPT_CD , UP_USER_ID , USE_YN , DEPT_LEVL , DISP_ORDER FROM BSC_INSA_DEPT WHERE YEAR = #findYear# AND ( DEPT_CD > '1025' OR DEPT_CD = '0000' OR DEPT_CD = '1000' )
AND DEPT_CD <> '1090'
ORDER BY DEPT_CD, DISP_ORDER

SELECT A.YEAR , A.DEPT_CD , F_DEPT_FULL_NM(#findYear#, A.DEPT_CD, 'BSC_INSA_DEPT') DEPT_KOR_NM , B.ASSESSOR_1ST_EMPN , C.KOR_NM AS FIRSTKORNM , B.ASSESSOR_2ND_EMPN , D.KOR_NM AS SECONDKORNM FROM BSC_INSA_DEPT A LEFT OUTER JOIN PRS_EMP_EVAL_ASSESSOR B ON A.YEAR = B.YEAR AND A.DEPT_CD = B.DEPT_CD LEFT OUTER JOIN BSC_INSA C ON B.YEAR = C.YEAR AND B.ASSESSOR_1ST_EMPN = C.EMPN LEFT OUTER JOIN BSC_INSA D ON B.YEAR = D.YEAR AND B.ASSESSOR_2ND_EMPN = D.EMPN WHERE A.DEPT_CD IN (SELECT DEPT_CD FROM BSC_INSA_DEPT WHERE YEAR = #findYear# START WITH DEPT_CD = #findDeptCd# CONNECT BY PRIOR YEAR = YEAR AND PRIOR DEPT_CD = UP_DEPT_CD) AND A.DEPT_CD > '1090'
AND A.YEAR = #findYear# AND A.DEPT_CD IN ( SELECT A.DEPT_CD FROM BSC_INSA_DEPT A LEFT OUTER JOIN BSC_INSA_DEPT B ON A.YEAR = B.YEAR AND A.USE_YN = B.USE_YN AND A.DEPT_CD = B.UP_DEPT_CD WHERE A.YEAR = #findYear#
AND A.DEPT_CD > '1090' GROUP BY A.DEPT_CD HAVING COUNT(B.DEPT_CD) = 0 ) ORDER BY A.DEPT_CD

SELECT A.DEPT_ID AS CODE_ID , A.DEPT_NM AS CODE_NM , A.UP_DEPT_ID AS UP_CODE_ID , LEVEL AS LEVEL_ID FROM V_DEPTINFO A WHERE BEING_YN = 'Y' START WITH UP_DEPT_ID IS NULL CONNECT BY PRIOR DEPT_ID = UP_DEPT_ID ORDER SIBLINGS BY OUORDER

SELECT A.SABUN , A.USER_ID , A.USER_NM , A.DEPT_ID , A.DEPT_NM , A.JIKGUB_CD , A.JIKGUB_NM , A.POS_CD , A.POS_NM , A.EMAIL FROM V_ROLE_USER A WHERE 1=1
A.DEPT_ID = #deptId#
UPPER(A.USER_NM) LIKE '%' || TRIM(UPPER(#findUserNm#)) ||'%'
ORDER BY A.JIKGUB_CD, A.POS_CD
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM PRS_EMP_EVAL_ASSESSOR WHERE DEPT_CD = #deptCd# AND YEAR = #year#
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO PRS_EMP_EVAL_ASSESSOR ( YEAR , DEPT_CD , ASSESSOR_1ST_EMPN , ASSESSOR_2ND_EMPN , CREATE_DT ) VALUES ( #year# , #deptCd# , #firstEmpn# , #seconEmpn# , sysdate )

INSERT INTO PRS_EMP_EVAL_ASSESSOR (YEAR, DEPT_CD, ASSESSOR_1ST_EMPN, ASSESSOR_2ND_EMPN) SELECT A.YEAR , A.DEPT_CD
, (select empn from BSC_INSA where YEAR = A.YEAR AND ROWNUM = '1' AND DEPT_CD = A.DEPT_CD AND POS_TC IN ('12', '21', '22', '2C', '31', '32', '34', '39') and EMPN in (select empn from bsc_insa_pcmt where year = #findYear# and end_pcmt_date = #findYear#||'1231' and pcmt_tc <> '34')) ASSESSOR1_EMPN , (select empn from BSC_INSA where YEAR = A.YEAR AND ROWNUM = '1' AND (( DEPT_CD = A.UP_DEPT_CD AND POS_TC IN ('11', '12', '13', '1B', '1C', '2A', '21', '23', '24', '2C')) OR (A.DEPT_CD IN ('5130', '5135') AND POS_TC IN ('06')) OR (A.DEPT_CD IN ('4005', '4015', '4025') AND POS_TC IN ('08'))) and EMPN in (select empn from bsc_insa_pcmt where year = #findYear# and end_pcmt_date = #findYear#||'1231' and pcmt_tc <> '34')) ASSESSOR2_EMPN
FROM BSC_INSA_DEPT A WHERE A.DEPT_CD IN (SELECT DEPT_CD FROM BSC_INSA_DEPT WHERE YEAR = #findYear# START WITH DEPT_CD = '0000' CONNECT BY PRIOR YEAR = YEAR AND PRIOR DEPT_CD = UP_DEPT_CD) AND A.DEPT_CD > '1090'
AND A.DEPT_CD IN ( SELECT A.DEPT_CD FROM BSC_INSA_DEPT A LEFT OUTER JOIN BSC_INSA_DEPT B ON A.YEAR = B.YEAR AND A.USE_YN = B.USE_YN AND A.DEPT_CD = B.UP_DEPT_CD WHERE A.YEAR = #findYear#
AND A.DEPT_CD > '1090' GROUP BY A.DEPT_CD HAVING COUNT(B.DEPT_CD) = 0 ) AND A.YEAR = #findYear# ORDER BY A.DEPT_CD
sqlMap.select: SELECT A.DEPT_CD , B.DEPT_KOR_NM , A.ASSESSOR_1ST_EMPN , C.KOR_NM FIRSTKORNM , A.ASSESSOR_2ND_EMPN , D.KOR_NM SECONDKORNM FROM PRS_EMP_EVAL_ASSESSOR A LEFT OUTER JOIN BSC_INSA_DEPT B ON A.YEAR = B.YEAR AND A.DEPT_CD = B.DEPT_CD LEFT OUTER JOIN BSC_INSA C ON A.YEAR = C.YEAR AND A.ASSESSOR_1ST_EMPN = C.EMPN LEFT OUTER JOIN BSC_INSA D ON A.YEAR = D.YEAR AND A.ASSESSOR_2ND_EMPN = D.EMPN
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO BSC_ADMIN (ADMIN_GUBUN, USER_ID) SELECT DISTINCT '31', A.ASSESSOR_EMPN FROM (SELECT DISTINCT ASSESSOR_1ST_EMPN AS ASSESSOR_EMPN FROM PRS_EMP_EVAL_ASSESSOR A WHERE A.ASSESSOR_1ST_EMPN IS NOT NULL AND YEAR = #findYear# UNION ALL SELECT DISTINCT ASSESSOR_2ND_EMPN FROM PRS_EMP_EVAL_ASSESSOR B WHERE B.ASSESSOR_2ND_EMPN IS NOT NULL AND YEAR = #findYear#) A
